scripts.prebuild: powershell  if (Test-Path -Path ./dist) {Remove-Item -Path ./dist/* -Recurse -Force}  && powershell if (Test-Path -Path C:\inetpub\wwwroot\FrontEnd) {Remove-Item -Path C:\inetpub\wwwroot\FrontEnd -Recurse -Force}
scripts.postbuild: powershell New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'C:\inetpub\wwwroot\FrontEnd' && powershell ; && icacls "C:\inetpub\wwwroot\FrontEnd" /grant "IIS_IUSRS:(RX)" /T  && powershell Copy-Item -Path ./dist/frontend/browser/* -Destination 'C:/inetpub/wwwroot/FrontEnd/' -Recurse -Force
